TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CodeVariableDeclarationStatement extends System.CodeDom.CodeStatement

span.span: Represents a variable declaration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以用于表示声明了一个变量的代码。 can be used to represent code that declares a variable. 属性指定要声明的变量的类型。The property specifies the type of the variable to declare. 属性指定要声明的变量的名称。The property specifies the name of the variable to declare. 属性是可选的并指定将在创建后将分配给变量的初始化表达式。The property is optional, and specifies an initialization expression to assign to the variable after it is created. > [!NOTE] > 某些语言可以通过发出单独的赋值语句的变量声明后实现的可选变量的初始化表达式。Some languages can implement the optional variable initialization expression by making a separate assignment statement after the variable declaration. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用来声明变量。This example demonstrates using a to declare a variable. [!code-cpp[CodeVariableDeclarationStatementExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeVariableDeclarationStatementExample/CPP/codevariabledeclarationstatementexample.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CodeVariableDeclarationStatementExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeVariableDeclarationStatementExample/CS/codevariabledeclarationstatementexample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CodeVariableDeclarationStatementExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeVariableDeclarationStatementExample/VB/codevariabledeclarationstatementexample.vb#2)]
